Text: Or “By the heavens with their marvellous orbits.”
Other possible translations: 1. “… by which the deluded are turned away.” 2. “Whoever is turned away from it is ˹truly˺ deluded.”
Optional prayers before dawn are recommended, and are more likely to be accepted.
Abraham (ﷺ) did not want his guests to know that he was going to prepare a meal for them so they would not ask him not to.

As mentioned in 11:69-70, the angels came to Abraham in the form of men and when he offered them food, they did not eat. In ancient Middle Eastern culture, if a guest refused to eat the food provided by their host, it was a sign of ill-will.
lit., ‘a barren wind,’ since the wind was not productive—it did not carry rain or fertilize trees.
Meaning, you have only three days to live. See 11:65.
The globe was spread out to accommodate Allah’s creation. The spherical shape of the earth is expressed in 39:5.
For example, male and female, sweet and bitter, day and night, plains and mountains, heat and cold, light and darkness.
Since you have already delivered the message clearly.
